title: Peer Advisory Group Learning Course for Sustainable Agriculture

context.prior_knowledge: Basic agricultural terminology and mathematical calculation skills
context.additional_context: A program for agricultural sector managers/leaders within enterprises, involving peer advisory groups to share sustainable agricultural practices and strengthen mathematics-based data analysis competencies

learning_goals: Through peer advisory group activities, learners can share and apply sustainable agricultural practice cases at least twice a month.
Learners can establish optimal resource allocation plans by utilizing agricultural resource management data and mathematical calculations (statistics, ratios).
Learners form self-directed learning habits by achieving over 80% attendance and quiz pass rates (70+ points) on mobile learning platforms.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
